ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلذَّٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرْوًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL TO witness those who scatter (dust) by dispersing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By the winds which scatter dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By the winds which carry dust particles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of those which carry away while dispersing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the wind that scatters far and wide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By those that winnow with a winnowing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By the winds that scatter the dust,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the dipersing winds that disperse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By the scattering [winds] that scatter [the clouds];
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said in the interpretation of Allah's saying (By those that winnow with a winnowing): '(By those that winnow with a winnowing) He says: Allah swears by the blowing winds and that which they carry into the homes of people,
